title: Spacious | Single storied | House for sale @ Mount Lavinia
details:
Spacious | Single storied | House for sale @ Mount Lavinia

* 10 Perches , ( 2600sq , ft )
* 3 Bedrooms / 3 ( A/C ) / ceiling fans
* 3 Attached bathrooms / solar Hot water
* Beautiful Living / Dining with Tv area
* Medium size landscaped front & rear garden area
* Spacious kitchen near to pantry area
* Fitted ceiling fans for most of the areas
* Solid wooden interior & exterior ( 1st class timber)
* Double Bricked Walls
* pipe born water with over head water tank
* Double car porch / 3 phase electricity / French windows
* Eye catching high wooden ceiling / fully tiled flooring
* Surrounded by well built walls with remote & wicket gate
